Title: An American Girl on the Home Front
Writer: Anna Sandor (teleplay), Valerie Tripp ("Molly" stories from the "American Girl Collection")
Actors: Maya Ritter, David Aaron Baker, Tory Green, Sarah Manninen
Plot: Molly is a girl living in the year 1944 and WWII has brought many changes to Molly's life. An English girl comes to live with Molly's family to escape the bombings. They slowly become good friends.
